definitions.definition: A location or restaurant where good eating can be expected.
definitions.example: Sally is having a breakfast munch at her place!
We had a good munch at the chippy.

definitions.definition: (BDSM) A casual meeting for those interested in BDSM, usually at a restaurant. See Munch (BDSM).
To chew with a grinding, crunching sound, and with the mouth closed — often used with on.
definitions.example: Jim was munching on a biscotti.

definitions.definition: To eat vigorously or with excitement.
definitions.example: Watching old Bill munch his pancakes makes me hungry!
